snippet: A Texas judge refused on Tuesday to quash on technicalities two criminal felony indictments for abuse of power against Gov. Rick Perry.
abstract: Texas Judge Bert Richardson refuses to quash on technicalities two criminal felony indictments for abuse of power against Gov Rick Perry.
lead_paragraph: A Texas judge refused on Tuesday to quash on technicalities two criminal felony indictments for abuse of power against Gov. Rick Perry.

headline.main: Texas: Judge Refuses to Dismiss Case Against Governor
headline.print_headline: Texas: Judge Refuses to Dismiss Case Against Governor
